summary: This is an email chain from November 2, 2021, regarding the upcoming Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. It congratulates investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force for their work on the Epstein case and informs them of the award details.

persons.name: Det
persons.role: Detective, NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force
persons.context: Award recipient recognized for work on the Epstein case. Mentioned as a point of contact for RSVP.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked on the Epstein case and are being jointly recognized with an award.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: Awards ceremony honoring investigators, including those who worked on the Epstein case. To be held at 1PP Auditorium with parking and lunch provided.

keyFacts: Investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force were recognized with the Finest Foundation Award for their work on the Epstein case.
The award ceremony was scheduled for November 9, 2021, at the 1PP Auditorium.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing recognition and institutional support for law enforcement personnel involved in the Epstein investigation years after the initial case developments.
